signUp.freeMemebership: Membership is free!  We charge no fee, of any kind.
signUp.canUnsubscribe: You can unsubscribe our membership any time (link is at bottom of our main page)
signUp.alreadyMember: Already a member and we haven't recognized you?
signUp.sslTechnology: This site is using SSL technology. Your details are kept encypted
signUp.emailUsage: We'll use your email only to confirm registration or hotel reservation, or to contact you in case of problem. No spam or 3rd party use.
signUp.doGood1: We want to do good and give back to the community and Planet Earth,
signUp.doGood2: Hence we ask our members for a
signUp.doGood5: a tree that will be planted
signUp.doGood6: At cost of 5 cents (0.05 Dollar or 0.05 Euro, depending on your location). You WILL NOT be charged now, but only when you make your first hotel reservation on Roomount
